{"step_by_step_thinking": "Humans have a mixed dentition, meaning they have different types of teeth for different functions. They have incisors for cutting and biting, canines for tearing and piercing, premolars for grinding, and molars for crushing and grinding. This indicates that humans are omnivorous, as they have teeth adapted for both plant and animal food sources.", "answer_choice": "B. Omnivorous"}
